item.title: More Job Details
item.description: We have some options to get more details about jobs. Looking at my train_zinc job we can break down status by task with sacct -j 349388 # output: # # JobID JobName Partition Account AllocCPUS State ExitCode # ------------ ---------- ---------- ---------- ---------- ---------- -------- # 349388 train_zin+ moh2-gpu local 1 RUNNING 0:0 # 349388.batch batch local 1 RUNNING 0:0 # 349388.exte+ extern local 1 RUNNING 0:0 # 349388.1 python local 1 RUNNING 0:0 and get all the job’s configuration with
